publication.title: Efficient Computation of Algebraic Immunity for Algebraic and Fast Algebraic Attacks
publication.authors: frederik armknecht,claude carlet,philippe gaborit,willi meier,olivier ruatta
publication.jconf: Theory and Application of Cryptographic Techniques
publication.keyword: Algebraic Attack;Algebraic Degree;Algebraic Immunity;Boolean Function;Fast Algebraic Attacks;Generic Algorithm;Large Classes;Multivariate Polynomial Interpolation;Stream Cipher;Symmetric Function;
publication.abstract: In this paper we propose several ecient algorithms for as- sessing the resistance of Boolean functions against algebraic and fast al- gebraic attacks when implemented in LFSR-based stream ciphers. An al- gorithm is described which permits to compute the algebraic immunity d of a Boolean function with n variables inO(D2) operations, for Dn d Â´ , rather than in O(D3)

publication.title: Distinguishing Attacks on T-Functions
publication.jconf: Inf. Conf. on Cryptology in Malaysia
